Headline: Temporary #12 Roosevelt Reroute at Roosevelt/Western
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted near Roosevelt/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ogden, Western, Roosevelt, and resume normal route due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Western.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains Between 35th and 63rd
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 35th and 63rd due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 35th and 63rd due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Howard and 35th, and,
  • between 63rd and 95th, only.

Shuttle buses have been requested from 35th to 63rd for connecting service.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#29 State Street

#24 Wentworth

#47 47th

#55 Garfield

#63 63rd

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
